steps.name: User verifies whether the Homepage navigates to the Search hotel page

elements.name: Verify the user is able to login the application

steps.name: User launches the application
User enters the valid "SharmiSivakumar"  in the username field
User enters the valid "sharmi1234"  in the password field
User clicks on the login button
User verifies whether the Homepage navigates to the Search hotel page

elements.name: Verify the user entered search hotel page

steps.name: User selects the "London" in the location field
User selects the "Hotel Sunshine" in the hotel field
User selects "Super Deluxe"  in the room type field
User selects "2"   in the number of room field
User enters "05/01/2021"  in the check in date field
User enters "07/01/2021"  in the check out date field
User selects "2 - Two"  in the adults per room field
User selects "3"  in the children per room field
User clicks on the search button
User verifies whether search hotel page navigates to select hotel page

elements.name: Verify the user entered to select hotel page

steps.name: User clicks on the select radion button
User clicks on the continue button
User verifies whether select hotel page navigates to book a hotel page

elements.name: Verify the user entered to book a hotel page

steps.name: User enters "Sharmi"  in the first name field
User enters "Sivakumar" in the last name field
User enters "Sathuvachari,Vellore"  in the billing address field
User enters "1234567891012345"  in the credit card no field
User selects "3"  in the credit card type field
User selects "4"  in the month date field
User selects "7" in the year field
User enters "1234" in the CCV number field
User clicks on the book now button
User verifies whether book hotel page navigates to booking confirmation page

elements.name: Verify the user entered to booking confirmation page

steps.name: User clicks on the logout button
User verifies whether the booking conformation page returned to homepage after logout

name: Booking functionality in the adactin application
